thread.title: Watch Aaron Rodgers Connect On An Incredible Hail Mary Before The Half
thread.title_full: Watch Aaron Rodgers Connect On An Incredible Hail Mary Before The Half

author: Bill DiFilippo
title: Watch Aaron Rodgers Connect On An Incredible Hail Mary Before The Half

organizations.name: watch aaron rodgers connect on an incredible hail mary before

text:
Of COURSE! Cobb hail marry TD pic.twitter.com/6QcVzokoC1 
— ⓂarcusD2.0 (@_MarcusD2_) January 8, 2017 

Aaron Rodgers is a magician. The Green Bay Packers’ quarterback threw a perfect hail mary to close out the first half of the team’s NFC Wild Card Game against New York that softly fell into the arms of Randall Cobb. The throw gave Green Bay a 14-6 lead heading into halftime.
